channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: U.S.-Taiwan Bilateral Trade Pact at Top of Agenda: AmCham Chair
item.description: After the U.S. decided to switch recognition from Taipei to Beijing in 1979, the American Chamber of Commerce in Taiwan shifted its focus. TaiwanPlus spoke to current AmCham chair

item.title: Migrant Workers Call for Aid after Hualien Earthquake
item.description: The earthquake in Hualien has put migrant workers in tough spot as they balance their jobs and their own safety. We spoke to Julia Mariano from Migrante Taiwan, an NGO that helps F

item.title: Rescuers May Have Found Bodies of Missing Hikers in Hualien's Taroko Gorge
item.description: Rescuers believe they've found the bodies of a family killed by a rockslide while hiking in Hualien's Taroko Gorge when last week's earthquake hit.

item.title: President Tsai Ing-wen Inspects Earthquake-Hit Hualien
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen has promised help for earthquake-hit Hualien. The comment came while she was inspecting the area.
